characters: Driver of a white van, driver of a silver sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on an urban road. Ahead, a white van is moving steadily in the same lane. A silver sedan on the left side lane is gradually moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
actions: The self-driving vehicle maintains a consistent speed and lane position, keeping a safe distance from the white van ahead. The vehicle is monitoring the silver sedan on the left lane, which appears to be moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
key_objects: 1) Front: A white van, approximately 20 meters away, moving steadily in the same lane. 2) Left side: A silver sedan, approximately 10 meters away, moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane.
